page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: We did a housing survey for our Domesday project in our area 26 33.} The types of houses were small detached, medium detached, large detached,terraced,bungalow,dormi-bungl ow,split level and semi detached.I counted 5 small detached 10 medium detached 4 large detached 1 terraced (4 houses) 0 bungalows 1 dormi-bungalow 4 split level and 2 semi detached.Most of the older houses have got slate roofs and are made of stone, and most of the modern houses have got tiled roofs and are made of brick.
